text:
Gm eng team welcome home! Recap of projects for the first half of this week:

• Launch admin UI
• Unblock BD team with manual setup of some accounts today
• Reward-calculation/distribution scripts planning/building
• Make sure we won’t lose FAP rights: <https://bit-safe.slack.com/archives/C094Q9TUVUL/p1753627671688259?thread_ts=1753627469.429859&channel=C094Q9TUVUL&message_ts=1753627671.688259|https://bit-safe.slack.com/archives/C094Q9TUVUL/p1753627671688259?thread_ts=1753627469.429859&channel=C094Q9TUVUL&message_ts=1753627671.688259>
• Chata and CMP installation
Let me know what I’m missing

text:
I think, since we can create accounts manually, we don’t need to rush the UI thing, <@U093Q4FPEJG> can keep moving on it when he’s back in action tmrw.

I’ll work on the rewards calculations.

text: <@U088UV6MKFE> did you learn anything about the party metadata updates ? If we could do that, I would not be waiting to hear back from Levl. I suppose I won’t wait either way tho

It's possible!

text: So we are good to go with temporary empty ones. But we will need some internal tooling to keep track. Could be the same place where we monitor balances, etc

text: perfect, yes sounds great. that will be a very useful table. Could have export features etc too perhaps in the future

text:
Nice find <@U088UV6MKFE>

I also found this, there is a ‘patch’ endpoint for a  specific party, but the docs say it’s to “allocate a new party” which seems like a bug, how can you allocate a new party with a patch to a specific party. Maybe you can leave a PR or a comment or something. Maybe this is the URL that your library uses under the hood

elements.text: Nice find

I also found this, there is a ‘patch’ endpoint for a  specific party, but the docs say it’s to “allocate a new party” which seems like a bug, how can you allocate a new party with a patch to a specific party. Maybe you can leave a PR or a comment or something. Maybe this is the URL that your library uses under the hood

text: yes the decription seems like bug. Patch calls the aforelinked `update` on the ledger_api, while the post calls `allocate`

elements.text: yes the decription seems like bug. Patch calls the aforelinked
update
on the ledger_api, while the post calls
allocate
nice job on Chata

attachments.text: Bird saves and reproduces data: A PNG image of a bird ( photo of a bird -> spectral synthesizer ) was reproduced by an adult Starling bird <https://t.co/eW4G6d4kdn>. It seems to have reproduced the sound in conjunction with some additional notes which made it not detectable
